Summary: witnesses ufo lifting out of trees and took off
trends: There have been no other sightings in Pineville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
divs: Sighting DetailsWorking 3rd shift. Sitting outside on break. Notice a glowing large ball of light that came straight up out of the trees. Hoovered in place a few seconds. Then the object flattened to a disc shape and shot off straight to the west. Traveled must faster than a plane and disappeared.
